summary: Consume Clearbit API to retrieve company or person information based on domain or email.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select whether to retrieve information about a company or a person.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the specific operation to perform, such as autocomplete or enrich.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The domain of the company to look up.

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Additional fields to include in the company information retrieval.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The partial name of the company for autocomplete operation.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address of the person to look up.

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Additional fields to include in the person information retrieval.
